Material used.Description: cDNA was synthesized from total RNA extracted from HEK293 cells.

Readout description.Result Description: UNC13A transcript levels were significantly reduced for the variant NM_005947.4:c.2565G>A compared to wild-type.
UNC13A transcript levels were significantly reduced for the variant NM_005947.4:c.2858A>T compared to wild-type.

Biological replicates.Description: Experiments were repeated three times on different days to account for biological variability.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type cDNA was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: t-test was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: UNC13A expression level greater than 20% of wild-type.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: UNC13A expression level less than 5% of wild-type.
